rows.label: bf05310100_0010
rows.name:
So old man Cole really did know the Pope.
Who'd have thought?

rows.label: bf05310100_0030
rows.name: Will Homura be OK by herself?

rows.label: bf05310100_0040
rows.name:
He's the Pope, dimwit.
What's he gonna do, eat her?

rows.label: bf05310100_0050
rows.name: ...Back there, I felt something weird for a second.

rows.label: bf05310100_0090
rows.name: ...It felt like we were talking to that Metsu guy.

rows.label: bf05310100_0110
rows.name:
You know he's Metsu's Driver,
and it's messing with your head.

rows.label: bf05310100_0120
rows.name: They not seem alike to me.

rows.label: bf05310100_0130
rows.name: No, I know - it was just for an instant!

rows.label: bf05310100_0140
rows.name:
Just this one moment where I couldn't tell if
we were talking to the Pope or Metsu...

rows.label: bf05310100_0150
rows.name: Sorry. I'm not explaining it well.

rows.label: bf05310100_0160
rows.name:
There are Blades who are influenced a lot
by their Drivers during resonance.

rows.label: bf05310100_0170
rows.name:
Their appearance, their personality...
That's probably all it is.

rows.label: bf05310100_0180
rows.name:
Perhaps it was due to your bond with Homura.
That could have heightened your perception of such things.
